alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 6:47PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southeastern Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 646 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 10 miles east of Mars Hill to Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument...and moving east AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Houlton, Patten, Hodgdon, Sherman, Island Falls, Bridgewater, Smyrna, Mount Chase, Dudley Township, Sherman Station, Smyrna Mills, Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Baxter State Park, Littleton, Linneus, Monticello, Oakfield, Blaine, New Limerick and Ludlow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 253 and 304. US Highway 1 between Houlton and Bridgewater. State Highway 11 between Stacyville and Patten. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Southeast Aroostook
